title: Diff. eq.: No context, from slope equation part - d

content.description: Let f be a function with f(1) = 4 such that for all points (x, y) on the graph of f the slope is given by 3x2+1 / 2y .
content.question: Use your solution from part (c) to find f(1.2).

frqParts.text: Use your solution from part (c) to find f(1.2).

topic.text: 7.7: Finding Particular Solutions Using Initial Conditions and Separation of Variables

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
